OSLevel.Description: manual operation permission. 0 = only on-site. >0: only from POL
manual operation permission. 0 = only on-site. >0: only from POL

VFlutTi.Description: Period of active signal before it is flutter-free, in s

VFlutCnt.Description: Counts of the allowed flutering signals in the defined period vFlutTi

StateOffAut.Description: Switch Operation Mode to 'Offline' in automatic mode

StateOpAut.Description: Switch Operation Mode to 'Operator' in automatic mode

StateAutAut.Description: Switch Operation Mode to 'Automatic' in automatic mode

StateOffOp.Description: Switch Operation Mode to 'Off' by operator

StateAutOp.Description: Switch Operation Mode to 'Automatic' by operator

SrcIntAut.Description: Switch Source Mode to 'Internal' in automatic mode

SrcIntOp.Description: Switch Source Mode to 'Internal' by operator

SrcManOp.Description: Switch Source Mode to 'Manual' by operator

PermEn.Description: Enables the Permission Lock. 1 = enabled (info for HMI)

Permit.Description: Permit, allows control. Does not activate safe position. 1 = permission given

IntlEn.Description: Enables the Interlock Lock. 1 = enabled (info for HMI)

Interlock.Description: Interlock, sets safe position. 0 = interlock active

ProtEn.Description: Enables the Protection Lock. 1 = enabled (info for HMI)

Protect.Description: Protect, sets safe position, sets protectState. 0 = Protect active

OSLevel.Description: manual operation permission. 0 = only on-site. >0: only from POL

Trip.Description: Drive Protection Indicator. 0: tripped, 1: no error

MonSafePos.Description: Behaviour if monitoring error. 1 = safe pos, 0 = hold pos

MonStatTi.Description: monitor time for static changes, in s

MonDynTi.Description: monitor time for dynamic changes, in s

StateOffOp.Description: Switch Operation Mode to 'Off' by operator

PermEn.Description: Enables the Permission Lock. 1 = enabled (info for HMI)

IntlEn.Description: Enables the Interlock Lock. 1 = enabled (info for HMI)

ProtEn.Description: Enables the Protection Lock. 1 = enabled (info for HMI)

Permit.Description: Permit, allows control. Does not activate safe position. 0 = no permission

Interlock.Description: Interlock, sets safe position. 0 = interlock active

Protect.Description: Protect, sets safe position, needs reset. 0 = Protect active

OSLevel.Description: manual operation permission. 0 = only on-site. >0: only from POL

SafePosEn.Description: Safe Position Enable. 0: has safe position, 1: hold position on interlock

MonSafePos.Description: Behaviour if monitoring error. 1 = safe pos, 0 = hold pos

MonStatTi.Description: monitor time for static changes, in s

MonDynTi.Description: monitor time for dynamic changes, in s

OpenedState.Description: For tracking the static monitoring error

ClosedState.Description: For tracking the static monitoring error

SafePosAct.Expression: (PermEn AND NOT Permit) OR (IntlEn AND NOT Interlock) OR (ProtEn AND NOT Protect) OR (MonEn AND (MonStatErr OR MonDynErr))

Ctrl_Set.Set: (SafePosAct AND SafePos AND NOT SafePosEn) OR (NOT SafePosAct AND ((OpenAut AND StateAutAct) OR (OpenOp and StateOpAct)))
Ctrl_Set.Comment:
open valve on interlock
open command when no interlock
close valve on interlock
close command when no interlock

Ctrl_Reset.Reset: (SafePosAct AND NOT SafePos AND NOT SafePosEn) OR (NOT SafePosAct AND ((CloseAut AND StateAutAct) OR (CloseOp and StateOpAct)))
Ctrl_Reset.Comment:
open valve on interlock
open command when no interlock
close valve on interlock
close command when no interlock

MonStatErr_Set.Set: (MonEn AND OpenedState AND NOT OpenFbk) OR ( MonEn AND ClosedState AND NOT CloseFbk)

MonStatErr_Reset.Reset: (ResetAut AND StateChannel) OR (ResetOp AND NOT StateChannel)

MonDynErr_Set.Set: MonEn AND ((Ctrl AND NOT OpenFbk) OR (NOT Ctrl AND NOT CloseFbk))

MonDynErr_Reset.Reset: (ResetAut AND StateChannel) OR (ResetOp AND NOT StateChannel)

StateOffOp.Comment: Reset at the end of the FB

StateOpOp.Comment: Reset at the end of the FB

StateAutOp.Comment: Reset at the end of the FB

OpenOp.Comment: Reset at the end of the FB

CloseOp.Comment: Reset at the end of the FB

ResetOp.Comment: Reset at the end of the FB
